tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    preferences JSON
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  preference_type VARCHAR,
  preference_value VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR,
  target_gender VARCHAR,
  target_age_range VARCHAR,
  target_location VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  customer_id INT,
  preference_type VARCHAR(50),
  preference_value VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  purchase_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  education_level VARCHAR(20),
  income DECIMAL(12, 2),
  marital_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  category VARCHAR(20),
  preference_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  action VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)
